Test Case Description: Observing the consistency check during sequential upshift from neutral to 1gear
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2. Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. No CAN failure & Gear control related failure should not be present
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1;BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ES_SWITCH_STATUS = 0x1 (ES switch pressed)

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to acheive [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM~= 1700 RPM]

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = Neutral [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x2]

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS = 0% to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 0kmph

4.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ 1700 RPM

4.2. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

4.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x2 (Neutral)

4.4. Cluster should display neutral gear ,0kmph and 1700RPM

4e. Check if the neutral lamp glows

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS   20% to acheive [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM~= 4400 RPM]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 1st [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x1]

6.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ 4400 RPM

6.2. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

6.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x1
Post Condition:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP = 0]

2. Set the Voltage 0V

Test Case Description: Observing the consistency check during sequential upshift from neutral to 2gear
Pre-Action:

4.4. Cluster should display  Neutral gear and  0kmph and 1700RPM

Test Case Description: Observing the consistency check during sequential  upshift  from 1gear to 2gear
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2. Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. No CAN failure & Gear control related failure should not be present
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1;BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ES_SWITCH_STATUS = 0x1 (ES switch pressed)

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to acheive [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM~= 4400 RPM]

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 1st [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x1]

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS =20 % to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 20 kmph

4.1. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ~ 4400 RPM

4.2. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

4.3. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x1

4.4.Cluster should display 1st gear and 20kmph and 4400RPM

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 2nd [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x4]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS = 26% to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 35 kmph

6.1. EMS should publish BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ 5200 RPM

6.2.EMS should publish BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

6.3. EMS should publish BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x4

6.4.Cluster should display 2nd gear, 35kmph and 5200RPM
Post Condition:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP = 0]

2. Set the Voltage 0V

Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1;BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ES_SWITCH_STATUS = 0x1 (ES switch pressed)

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to acheive [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM~= 4400 RPM]

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 1st [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x1]

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS = 20% to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 20 kmph

4.1. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ 4400 RPM

4.2. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

4.3. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x1

4.4.Cluster should display 1st gear, 20kmph and 4400RPM

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = Neutral [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x2]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS = 0% to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~= 0 kmph

6.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ 1700 RPM

6.2. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

6.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x2

6.4. Check Cluster should display  Neutral gear, 0kmph and 1700RPM
Post Condition:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP = 0]

2. Set the Voltage 0V

Test Case Description: Observing gear position determination during multiple ignition cycles
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2. Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. No CAN failure & Gear control related failure should not be present

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 2nd [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x4] (If possible, Check for all Gears)

3. Do multiple ignition cycles(Ignition_Off-->Ignition On) 10 times

3.1. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ 5200 RPM

3.2. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

3.3. BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x4

3.4. Cluster should display 2nd gear, 0kmph
Post Condition:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP = 0]

2. Set the Voltage 0V

Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2. Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. No CAN failure & Gear control related failure should not be present
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS = 0% to acheive [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM~=idle RPM]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 2nd [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x4]

2.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈idle RPM

2.2. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

2.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x4

2.4. Cluster should display 2nd gear,  0kmph and idle RPM

3. Perform Power OFF

3.1. Check if Cluster & EMS will go OFF

4. Perform Power ON

4.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x4

4.2. Cluster should display 2nd gear, 0kmph and 5200RPM
Post Condition:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP = 0]

2. Set the Voltage 0V

Test Case Description: Observing gear position determination during ignition cycles
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2. Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. No CAN failure & Gear control related failure should not be present

2.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x4

2.4. Cluster should display 2nd gear, 0 kmph and idle RPM

3.Turn Ignition OFF.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 0]

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 1st 

6.Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

6.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x1

6.4. Cluster should display 1st gear
Post Condition:

2. Set the Voltage 0V

Test Case Description: Observing gear position determination during under voltage
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2. Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. No CAN failure & Gear control related failure should not be present
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 2nd [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x4]

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS = 26%

2.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ 5200 RPM

2.2. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

2.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x4

2.4. Cluster should display 2nd gear, 20kmph and 5200RPM

3. Gradually reduce the battery voltage until it reaches 7.5V

3.1. Cluster & EMS will go OFF

4. Wait for 5 seconds and Check if cluster turned OFF

5. Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 1st  [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x1]

6.Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V 

6.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

6.2. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0x1

6.4. Cluster should display 1st gear (Repeat this procedure for other gears)
Post Condition:
1. Turn Ignition OFF.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP = 0]

2. Set the Voltage 0V

Test Case Description: Observing the consistency check during sequential downshift from  1 gear to 4 gear
Pre-Action:
1. Set Battery Voltage to 13.5V

2. Turn Ignition ON.[HIL_Mdl_Ignition_SW_IP= 1]

3. No CAN failure & Gear control related failure should not be present
Test Steps.Action:
1.Simulate HIL_Engine_Start_SW=1;BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ES_SWITCH_STATUS = 0x1 (ES switch pressed)

2.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS to acheive [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM~= 7000 RPM]

3.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 1st  [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x1]

4.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS = 50% to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~=13 kmph

4.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ refer notes for RPM

4.2. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

4.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0xB

4.4. Cluster should display 1st gear, 13 kmph 

5.Simulate HIL_Mdl_GPS = 4 [BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION =  0x8]

6.Simulate HIL_Mdl_Cons_APS = 35 % to achieve BUS_CLUSTER_QS_CC_TC_SETTING_0x120_DISPLAY_SPEED ~=40 kmph

6.1. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_ENGINE_RPM ≈ refer notes for RPM

6.2. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_5_0x151_ENGINE_STATUS = 0x0 (Running)

6.3. Check BUS_ENGINE_DATA_1_0x150_GEAR_POSITION=  0xD

6.4. Cluster should display 4th  gear,40 kmph
